item.description:
$20 for the R-Rated Hypnotist show! Dinner is pay-for-what-you order unless some people want to share PuPu platters and such!

Dinner at 6:45 - Show starts at 8:00. Everyone must gather as a group to buy the tickets in order to sit together. PLEASE arrive at 6:30 so everyone can go up and buy their show tickets together. If you aren't with the group you may still get a ticket (unless it sells out) but you won't be sitting with the group.
item.name: Dinner and a Comedy Show at Kowloons - Frank Santos Jr. the R-Rated Hypnotist
